content.question: Which of the following is the Maclaurin series for <math alttext="x times the, cosine of, open parenthesis, x squared, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="x minus the fraction, x to the fifth power over 2 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction, x to the ninth power over 4 factorial, end fraction, minus the fraction, x to the thirteenth power over 6 factorial, end fraction, plus, dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>13</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x minus the fraction, x cubed over 2 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction, x to the fifth power over 4 factorial, end fraction, minus the fraction, x to the seventh power over 6 factorial, end fraction, plus, dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="x cubed, minus the fraction, x to the seventh power over 3 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction, x to the eleventh power over 5 factorial, end fraction, minus the fraction, x to the fifteenth power over 7 factorial, end fraction, plus, dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="x cubed, minus the fraction x to the fifth power over 3 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction, x to the seventh power over 5 factorial, end fraction, minus the fraction, x to the ninth power over 7 factorial, end fraction, plus, dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x minus the fraction, x to the fifth power over 2 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction, x to the ninth power over 4 factorial, end fraction, minus the fraction, x to the thirteenth power over 6 factorial, end fraction, plus, dot dot dot" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>13</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 10.15: (BC ONLY) Representing Functions as Power Series

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
